body_html: @vadimkantorov I'm not sure I actually understand. If you want to weight specific pairs, that should be possible in a condensed format. Either way, if you want the full format then you can use norm as specified in the help text for the batch version. I'm not clear on when you would need to convert to and from the condensed version, but I think the better way to do that is with something like triu / tril that numpy has.

body: @vadimkantorov I'm not sure I actually understand. If you want to weight specific pairs, that should be possible in a condensed format. Either way, if you want the full format then you can use norm as specified in the help text for the batch version. I'm not clear on when you would need to convert to and from the condensed version, but I think the better way to do that is with something like triu / tril that numpy has.
